title: Taming The Lady
description: Josephina flaunts society's rules to drive carriages in the park and join the men in a spirited hunt. She refuses to marry and wears her old maid label with gusto.The Earl of Sunningdale reluctantly fought a duel to defend his sister's honour and had to leave the country for some years. When his father died, he inherited the title and returned home.Fated to meet, their relationship is doomed to failure. Bathed in a scandal, thwarted by well-meaning mothers, and engrossed with their siblings' antics, Frederick and Josephina are sure to win you over in this engaging Regency Romance.
author: Daisy Landish
